Beerskis - Traveling with Friends

Tim and I have always appreciated the company of everyone who has joined us on our travels and activities over the years. We have made life-long friends, formed families and watched each other go through life. Now that we have more time, we are digging through pictures and sharing memories of some of these trips. We hope that you enjoy what we've found and can share some of your pictures and other memories with all of us. This website is here to provide a home for all of this.
